TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DragDrop extends System.Object
public ref class DragDrop abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用以啟始拖放作業的 Helper 方法與欄位，包括開始拖放作業的方法，以及用以加入及移除拖放相關事件處理常式的機能。

span.span: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放功能一般是指資料傳送的方法，這種方法需要使用滑鼠 (或其他一些指標裝置) 選取一或多個物件，將這些物件拖曳到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中一些想要的置放目標上，然後置放這些物件。Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them. 拖放作業相當於複本 （或剪下）-和-貼上用來將資料從一個物件或應用程式之間傳輸的作業。A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another. 拖放作業通常牽涉到兩個合作對象： 從拖曳來源被拖曳的資料來源以及在置放目標會接收已卸除的資料。Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data. 拖放作業所需的事件和方法會在 類別中定義。The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the class. 拖放事件所附加的事件可附加至任何或。The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any or . 拖曳來源和置放目標可能會在相同的應用程式或不同的應用程式的 UI 項目。The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications. 不過，在置放目標必須知道如何處理拖曳來源傳遞的資料。However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source. > [!NOTE] > 和類別包含拖放事件的別名，如此會顯示事件類別的 [成員] 清單中，但這些類別會繼承基底類別。The and classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class. 事件處理常式附加至這些類別的其中一個上拖放事件時，附加處理常式的基礎事件，而且接收事件資料的相同執行個體。When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying event and they receive the same instance of event data. 如需範例，請參閱 。For example, see . 拖曳來源會呼叫靜態 方法，並將所傳送的資料傳遞給該方法，來啟始拖放作業。The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 項目通常會處理下列事件時拖曳來源：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source: - - 項目通常會處理下列事件時，它在置放目標：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target: - - - - 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).

span.span: The dependency object (a or ) to which to add the event handler.

param.name: handler
param.span: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

summary.span: 將 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

span.span: Adds a event handler to a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds. 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版事件。This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the event. 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱。To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.DragDropEffects DoDragDrop (System.Windows.DependencyObject dragSource, object data, System.Windows.DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(class System.Windows.DependencyObject dragSource, object data, valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects allowedEffects) cil managed
Public Shared Function DoDragDrop (dragSource As DependencyObject, data As Object, allowedEffects As DragDropEffects) As DragDropEffects
public: static System::Windows::DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ dragSource, System::Object ^ data, System::Windows::DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

param.name: dragSource
param.span: 相依性物件的參考，此物件為要拖曳之資料的來源。

span.span: A reference to the dependency object that is the source of the data being dragged.

param.name: data
param.span: 包含要拖曳之資料的資料物件。

span.span: A data object that contains the data being dragged.

param.name: allowedEffects
param.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定拖放作業允許的效果。

span.span: One of the values that specifies permitted effects of the drag-and-drop operation.

summary.span: 啟始拖放作業。

span.span: Initiates a drag-and-drop operation.

returns.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定在拖放作業期間執行的最終效果。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 負責應用程式，判斷拖曳，就會發生，然後再啟始拖放作業。It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation. 一般而言，這是當和一連串事件會透過拖曳的項目。Typically, this is when a and sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged. 您藉由呼叫靜態啟始拖放作業方法並傳遞給它來傳送的資料。You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 方法會視需要自動將資料包裝在 中。The method will automatically wrap the data in a if necessary. 為了進一步控制資料格式，您可以將資料包裝在 中，再傳遞給 方法。For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a before passing it to the method. 從傳回的值方法是值中拖放目標屬性設定事件處理常式。The value returned from the method is the value of the property set in the drop target’s event handler. 如果傳回的值不符合其中一個`allowedEffects`呼叫中指定，不會執行拖放作業。If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從 項目的 事件處理常式啟始拖放作業，使該項目成為拖曳來源。The following example shows how to initiate a drag-and-drop operation from the event handler of an element to make it a drag source. 傳送的資料是橢圓形之 屬性的字串表示。The transferred data is the string representation of the ellipse’s property. 資料傳遞給做為字串的方法，在自動換行。The data is passed to the method as a string and is automatically wrapped in a . [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#dodragdrop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#dodragdrop)]

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目的界限拖曳物件時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when an object is dragged over the element's bounds. 此欄位會識別反昇新版事件。This field identifies the bubbling version of the event. 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱。For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see .

summary.span: 識別 附加事件
